snippet: An anti-tax package is the keystone of his 2014 legislative package for New York.
abstract: Editorial questions whether New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo's proposal to cut taxes by $2 billion over next three years, keystone of his 2014 legislative agenda, will be good for the people of the state; holds pro-business tax cuts will offer modest relief to middle-class New Yorkers, but they also could mean less money for education, housing and other public services.
lead_paragraph: An anti-tax package is the keystone of his 2014 legislative package for New York.
